channel.title: Changing coords on emotes
channel.description:
ok, u know on pimpscape or some other sources they have "train" on their emotes? ok, this always makes me go to the dummy place in varrock, how can i change the coords so i can make it go in a diff coord?
also tutters, how do i change the place when they die?

item.title: Changing coords on emotes
item.dc:creator: @azn_pker1 azn pker1
item.description:
@azn_pker1 wrote:

what i mean is, like when u die from pking, u land in varrock bank, how do i change that
where do i search train in?

i just have
sendFrame126("@gre@Train",181

Read full topic

item.title: Changing coords on emotes
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

seach train or laugh emote or just laugh

It will say something like

sendFrame126(Train, ###) coords 2500 coords 2500
Somethin like that

Change the coords to the one you want.

What do you mean by your second question?

Read full topic
